page.title: 06Summer Fair, Hilltop,Talke
page.content: This year it was on 8th of June with many things to win and lots to do.In 1984 we had a dragon.Each year we have a Â£Rose Queen 'and this year it was Joanne Barlow,who is 11 and chosen from the top class.She was crowned by Miss Stoke-on-Trent,Karen Oakes. We had many stalls like fancy goods, toys,crazy kitchen and lucky dip.There were many things to eat like ice cream, hot dogs and cakes with refreshments in the youth club on our playground. Audley Brass Band came and there was a troupe dancing competition.There was a fancy dress competition with outfits like a robot, baker,cat,Mr Strong,ghost and a table cloth.
